title: The [f]aithful lovers of the West. Come joyn with me all you that love, and faithful to each other prove: Example take by this my song, all you that stand within this throng. To the tune of, As I walkt forth to take the air. / By William Blundun.
author: Blunten, William.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for P. Brooksby near the Hospital-gate in VVest Smithfield.,
